refbody.section: PurposeWithin an edit session, discard all changes that were made to a configuration object during the session, and exit the edit session.
Usage NotesUnlike the cancel command, the top command cancels all nested edit sessions.

ExampleCancel changes that are made to the gateway setting on an ethernet interface and exit the edit session. edit ethernet-interface eth2 Console ethernet-interface:eth2> ip Entering "ip" mode Console ethernet-interface:eth2 ip> ipv4-default-gateway Entering "ipv4-default-gateway" mode Console ethernet-interface:eth2 ip ipv4-default-gateway> set gateway 192.0.2.0 Console ethernet-interface:eth2 ip ipv4-default-gateway> top Cancelled
